nodes.text: 6Y-2KPR was a white-domed KPR servant droid manufactured by Lerrimore Droids.

In 0 BBY, this droid was the property of Nebit's clan and it was stored on the same sandcrawler that held R2-D2 and C-3PO captive after they escaped from the Tantive IV. When the sandcrawler arrived at the moisture farm of Owen Lars and sold R2-D2 and C-3PO to the Lars family, 6Y-2KPR was not one of the droids selected to be shown in the auction.
